metadata.title: CVE-2024-36922 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: iwlwifi: read txq->read_ptr under lockIf we read txq->read_ptr without lock, we can read the samevalue twice, then obtain the lock, and reclaim from thereto two different places, but crucially reclaim the sameentry twice, resulting in the WARN_ONCE() a little later.Fix that by reading txq->read_ptr under lock.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
